MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「で」
理樹@「うん？」
鈴@「どうやって深めていくんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How are we supposed to strengthen our relationship?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How are we supposed to strengthen our relationship?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…えっと」
鈴@「うん」
理樹@「それは」
鈴@「うん」
理樹@「…色々あるから全部言えないよ」
鈴@「そんなにたくさんあるのか？」
理樹@「もちろんだよ」
鈴@「うーみゅ…そうか」
は独り言のように呟いた。
鈴@「じゃあ、最初は何をする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So, what's the first thing we should do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So, what's the first thing we should do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ…今から？」
鈴@「もちろん。今から」
理樹@「えっと、えっと…」
はどぎまぎして慌てて考え始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I frantically sought for an answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I frantically sought for an answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ったなりこれじゃ、まるっきりダメじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing that came to my mind felt like an entirely good idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing that came to my mind felt like an entirely good idea.

MESSAGE.JP: は僕をじっと見ながら、小首をかしげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked at me with her head cocked in puzzlement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked at me with her head cocked in puzzlement.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「……今から、今からできること……」
てなんだろ。
理樹@「あぁ、考えれば考えるほど思いつかないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, the more I think about it, the more confused I become.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, the more I think about it, the more confused I become.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだギブアップか？」
理樹@「ギブアップするのはなにか悔しい気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd hate to give up right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd hate to give up right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それは同感だな」
鈴@「思いつくまで待ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's wait until you can think of a good idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's wait until you can think of a good idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん」
っと僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She went back to staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went back to staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「り、鈴？」
鈴@「なんだ」
理樹@「…なんでもない…」
っかり長期戦の構えだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was prepared to wait for as long as it took.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was prepared to wait for as long as it took.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…でも、待ってくれるなら考えよう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...In that case, I really have to think of something...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...In that case, I really have to think of something...)

MESSAGE.JP: は考え始めた。
ょっと間抜けだなぁ、と思いながら。
MESSAGE.EN: I was feeling a bit pathetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was feeling a bit pathetic.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴっ、と携帯のアラームが時報を告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: The beeping of my cellphone's alarm informed me of the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The beeping of my cellphone's alarm informed me of the time.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんかお腹空いたな…」
鈴@「くぅ」
理樹@「鈴？」
は寝息を立てていた。
理樹@「鈴…」
ちゃったのか。長く考えすぎるにも程があった。
MESSAGE.EN: When did she fall asleep? I really must've taken too long thinking...
MESSAGE.Translation: When did she fall asleep? I really must've taken too long thinking...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん」
顔をまじまじと見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a long look at her sleeping face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a long look at her sleeping face.

MESSAGE.JP: 髪が微かにゆれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hair fluttered ever so slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hair fluttered ever so slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: はそろそろと指を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly reached out with my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly reached out with my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: センチの距離。
理樹@「っ」
く、と指を止める。
をつついて起こそう。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to poke her cheek to wake her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to poke her cheek to wake her up.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、このまま居眠りしてたら風邪引くし。
MESSAGE.EN: Look, she's gonna catch a cold if I don't.
MESSAGE.Translation: Look, she's gonna catch a cold if I don't.

MESSAGE.JP: なんで僕言い訳してるんだろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I looking for an excuse...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I looking for an excuse...

MESSAGE.JP: も、起こさなくちゃいけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I did have to wake her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I did have to wake her up.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、頬に、指を…その瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why, my fingers... to her cheek... Then suddenly...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why, my fingers... to her cheek... Then suddenly...

MESSAGE.JP: くん、と首が落ちた。
鈴@「ふにゃ!?」
理樹@「っ！」
鈴@「ぅあ」
鈴@「んー…」
しこし、とこぶしで目を擦る鈴。
鈴@「おはよ」
理樹@「お、おはよ」
鈴@「ん…んー？」
鈴@「ふぁぁぁ」
鈴@「ん」
は再び頬杖を付いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She rested her chin on her hands again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She rested her chin on her hands again.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「思いついたか？」
理樹@「…うん」
鈴@「言ってみろ」
理樹@「お腹空いたから、ごはん食べよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm hungry, let's go get something to eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm hungry, let's go get something to eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん」
くり、と鈴は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded her head in assent.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded her head in assent.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんな時間でも学食やってるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The cafeteria seems to still be open at this hour.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The cafeteria seems to still be open at this hour.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人がけの席に並んで座る。
MESSAGE.EN: We sat down at a table for two.
MESSAGE.Translation: We sat down at a table for two.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「びっくりだ」
はいえ、軽食がほとんどみたいだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Although it was open, there were only snacks left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although it was open, there were only snacks left.

MESSAGE.JP: とはサプリ食品とかみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Snacks and what looked like food supplements.
MESSAGE.Translation: Snacks and what looked like food supplements.

MESSAGE.JP: おばちゃん@「はい、サンドイッチ」
理樹@「あ、ありがとうございます」
理樹@「片付けていたところなのにすみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, you already cleaned up the place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, you already cleaned up the place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばちゃん@「いいのよ、別に。おなかが空くのはしょうがないもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Don't mention it. It can't be helped that you were feeling hungry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Don't mention it. It can't be helped that you were feeling hungry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばちゃん@「まぁ具はまかないの残りになっちゃうけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Well, I had to use the scraps to make them anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Well, I had to use the scraps to make them anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばちゃん@「お皿は洗ってトレイ置き場においておいてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Leave the dishes on the tray after you wash them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Leave the dishes on the tray after you wash them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ言って学食のおばちゃんは厨房へ消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She told us and disappeared into the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told us and disappeared into the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まかないの具ってなんだ？」
理樹@「なんだろうね」
ンドイッチはトースターで軽くあぶられてきつね色になっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The bread was slightly toasted on the outside and had a pleasant brown tint.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bread was slightly toasted on the outside and had a pleasant brown tint.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「中身は…目玉焼きとハムカツ…の切れ端」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's... sunny side up eggs and ham cutlet inside... Or scraps of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's... sunny side up eggs and ham cutlet inside... Or scraps of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んぐ…ほうれん草とマヨネーズ」
理樹@「てりやきハンバーグとシュウマイが半分入ってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A half of a teriyaki hamburger and a half of a meat dumpling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A half of a teriyaki hamburger and a half of a meat dumpling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「肉じゃが…っぽい」
々謎な中身だった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were all kinds of mysterious things inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were all kinds of mysterious things inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「メニュー通りだね。『おまかせホットサンド』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just what it said on the menu, ❛Surprise Sandwiches.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just what it said on the menu, ❛Surprise Sandwiches.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「毎日違うんだろうな」
理樹@「明日の晩もやってみる？」
鈴@「この時間お腹空いてたらな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I feel hungry at this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I feel hungry at this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
が少ないせいか、遠くの席の会話も時々内容が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Because it wasn't that crowded, I could catch snippets of conversations from the tables.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because it wasn't that crowded, I could catch snippets of conversations from the tables.

MESSAGE.JP: がつくと、サンドイッチをもふもふしながら二人でそれらの会話を聞いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We ended up focusing our attention on what the other people were talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ended up focusing our attention on what the other people were talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あっちの席さ、さっきからやたらオーバーリアクションしてそうだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The group over there has been pretty loud since a while ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The group over there has been pretty loud since a while ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「すっごい元気な声だな」
うしてこう投げる！　とか取る！　とか聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear things like ❛Then you pitch!❜ or ❛Catch the ball!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear things like ❛Then you pitch!❜ or ❛Catch the ball!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「部活関係かな？」
鈴@「それっぽいな」
理樹@「あー、鈴」
鈴@「んぃ？」
ンを咥えたままの鈴に提案してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a suggestion to Rin, who was occupied with eating her sandwich.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a suggestion to Rin, who was occupied with eating her sandwich.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「会話してるひとたちのシチュを考えようのコーナー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wanna try to guess what's going on over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wanna try to guess what's going on over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…んぐ、唐突に始まったな」
理樹@「予想してせーのでちらっと見てみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's make a guess and then take a quick peek over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's make a guess and then take a quick peek over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「しょーもないなー」
理樹@「そ、そうかな…」
理樹@「鈴？」
鈴@「理樹はどう思う。あっちの元気な声のやつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you think, Riki? About those excited voices over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you think, Riki? About those excited voices over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んー、一年生女子が部活の先輩と話してる。多分新人戦が近いから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm, the freshman girls are talking to their seniors from the club. Most likely because they're having a match between rookies soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm, the freshman girls are talking to their seniors from the club. Most likely because they're having a match between rookies soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は？」
鈴@「逆だ」
理樹@「逆？」
鈴@「語ってるのは二年女子。一年の後輩に説教してる。多分新人戦が近いから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The ones who're talking are the sophomores. Must be lecturing the first years. Most likely because they're having a match between rookies soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The ones who're talking are the sophomores. Must be lecturing the first years. Most likely because they're having a match between rookies soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きなり見解が分れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: We had polar opinions on the matter.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had polar opinions on the matter.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあみてみよう。せーの」
鈴@「ちらっ」
理樹@「いやそこでちらって言わなくていいから鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to say ❛peek-a-boo❜ when you do that, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to say ❛peek-a-boo❜ when you do that, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ」
振り手振りで話しているのは背の低い女子生徒だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a short girl who was talking, gesturing fervently with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a short girl who was talking, gesturing fervently with her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり僕が正解じゃない？」
鈴@「んー…」
の間にも二人は席を立ち上がって、何かやりとりしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Meanwhile two other people got up from their seats and seemed to be discussing something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meanwhile two other people got up from their seats and seemed to be discussing something.

MESSAGE.JP: 器を男子生徒のほうが持つと言い張っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed to be telling the male students to take care of the dishes.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed to be telling the male students to take care of the dishes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ってことは…」
輩は座っててください、とか聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Please take a seat, senpai,❜ I heard someone say.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Please take a seat, senpai,❜ I heard someone say.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありゃ。鈴が正解か」
理樹@「でも、どうしてわかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But how did you figure it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But how did you figure it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんとなく」
理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…」
鈴@「というのは嘘で、呼び捨てにしてるかんじがしたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Or not, I think I heard that she wasn't using honorifics.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Or not, I think I heard that she wasn't using honorifics.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、そうかな…」
鈴@「先輩を呼び捨てにはしないだろ、ふつー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You would normally use honorifics when talking to your senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You would normally use honorifics when talking to your senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それもそうだね。うう、いきなり一敗目」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Makes sense. Ugh, I lost this round.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Makes sense. Ugh, I lost this round.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「というわけで、理樹が残してるたまごサンドゲット」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So that's why I'm taking your egg sandwich.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So that's why I'm taking your egg sandwich.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うっ！」
ごく味付けがよかったからひとつ残しておいたのに！
MESSAGE.EN: It was so good that I had saved it for last!
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so good that I had saved it for last!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「気がついてたんだ、鈴…」
鈴@「理樹は好きなモノは最後に残しておくタイプだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're the type to leave what you like best for last.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're the type to leave what you like best for last.❞

MESSAGE.JP: るで猫相手にするときのように言う鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke in the same way as when talking to her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke in the same way as when talking to her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「食べておかないとこうなるんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's what you get for not eating something when you have the chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's what you get for not eating something when you have the chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「にゃふふ」
まごサンドを咥えたまま鈴は笑みを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: She flashed a mischievous grin as she sunk her teeth in the sandwich.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flashed a mischievous grin as she sunk her teeth in the sandwich.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「り、リベンジ」
鈴@「んぃ」
度はどうしようか…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should we do this time...
MESSAGE.Translation: What should we do this time...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「少し遠目だけど、なんか女子の集団がいるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There seems to be a group of girls all the way over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There seems to be a group of girls all the way over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれはなにしてるんだろう、で、どうかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's try to guess what they're up to, this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's try to guess what they're up to, this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹はどう思う？」
理樹@「うーん」
ょっと集中して聞いてみる。
度こそは！　必ず！　なんとしても！　…と言ってるようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if I was telling myself ❛I won't lose this time no matter what it takes!❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if I was telling myself ❛I won't lose this time no matter what it takes!❜...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんかの相談っぽいね」
鈴@「そうだな」
理樹@「問題は何の相談かってことなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The problem is what exactly it is they're discussing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The problem is what exactly it is they're discussing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「集団…ってことは、チームかなにかかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a group... So it's probably some kind of a team?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a group... So it's probably some kind of a team?❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり部活関係？
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it has to be a club?
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it has to be a club?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…こないだの試合かなにかで負けたので、反省会中、かなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm betting they lost a match recently and are now analyzing their mistakes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm betting they lost a match recently and are now analyzing their mistakes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしもそう思うな」
理樹@「見解が一致したね」
もそれだとクイズにならないか。
MESSAGE.EN: But there's no challenge like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there's no challenge like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「バレー部」
鈴@「ソフト部」
たも見解が分れてしまった…。
理樹@「どうしてソフト部？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do you think it's a softball club?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do you think it's a softball club?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…なんかソフト部っぽい声だろ」
理樹@「え、そうかなぁ…」
いうかどんな声なんだそれ。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, what kind of voice is that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, what kind of voice is that?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあみてみよう。せーの」
鈴@「じろっ」
理樹@「いやそこでじろって言わなくていいから鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really don't need to say ❛peek-a-boo❜ when you do that, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really don't need to say ❛peek-a-boo❜ when you do that, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ジャージ姿でわからない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't tell, they're all wearing jerseys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't tell, they're all wearing jerseys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ズボンの裾の折り曲げ方に注目だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Pay attention to how they roll up their pants.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Pay attention to how they roll up their pants.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　…あ、ほんとだ。なんで右だけ折り曲げてるんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? ...Oh, you're right. Why do they only have the right side rolled up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? ...Oh, you're right. Why do they only have the right side rolled up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「走ったときに裾がひっかからないためらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I heard it can get entangled when they run.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I heard it can get entangled when they run.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇ、確かに女子ってジャージ、だぶだぶなの着てる子が多いよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you're right. The jersey looks pretty loose on some of the girls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you're right. The jersey looks pretty loose on some of the girls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とつ賢くなったかも。
MESSAGE.EN: She might have actually learned a thing or two.
MESSAGE.Translation: She might have actually learned a thing or two.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「と、ささせがわささみが言ってた」
理樹@「えぇー」
鈴@「女子寮でも同じカッコしてるからな、あいつら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝They wear the same clothes in the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝They wear the same clothes in the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 情報の段階で僕は負けていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was one step ahead of me information-wise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was one step ahead of me information-wise.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うう、また負けた…」
鈴@「というわけで、理樹が残している…」
鈴@「残している…」
理樹@「どっちでもいいよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Feel free to pick either of them, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Feel free to pick either of them, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どっちもいらんな」
理樹@「勝者の権利だからちゃんと貰ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's your right as the winner, so you have to pick one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's your right as the winner, so you have to pick one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うう勝者めんどいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh... It sucks to be the winner...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh... It sucks to be the winner...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方は和風ピクルス（だけ）サンド。
MESSAGE.EN: A pickle (and nothing else) sandwich on one side.
MESSAGE.Translation: A pickle (and nothing else) sandwich on one side.

MESSAGE.JP: う片方はたくあん（だけ）サンド。
MESSAGE.EN: A radish (and nothing else) sandwich on the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: A radish (and nothing else) sandwich on the other.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ和風ピクルスのほう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, I'm taking the one with pickles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, I'm taking the one with pickles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「や、やっぱりそっち取るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I knew you'd take that one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I knew you'd take that one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「たくあんよりマシだ」
理樹@「うう…」
りぼり。
んな風にして、鈴と過ごした。
MESSAGE.EN: In this fashion, we spent the rest of the day together.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this fashion, we spent the rest of the day together.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、おやすみ鈴」
鈴@「おやすみ」
りん。
の音だけ残して、鈴は寮へ消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of her bell echoed in the darkness and she disappeared into the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of her bell echoed in the darkness and she disappeared into the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 日の授業も無事終了。
MESSAGE.EN: The classes were over for the day.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classes were over for the day.

MESSAGE.JP: 課後、どうしようか…？
室を出ると、いつもとは逆方向へ足を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the classroom and was headed in the opposite direction than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the classroom and was headed in the opposite direction than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴！」
りん。
が階段の影から出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She emerged from the shadow of the staircase.
MESSAGE.Translation: She emerged from the shadow of the staircase.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスメイトだから一緒に出ればいいんだろうけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd make a lot more sense if we just went out together, what with us being classmates...
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd make a lot more sense if we just went out together, what with us being classmates...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「はずいだろ」
理樹@「確かにそうだよね」
つもの面子でいるときは気にならなかったことが、今は気になった。
MESSAGE.EN: That hadn't seemed like a problem so far, but it'd started bugging me now.
MESSAGE.Translation: That hadn't seemed like a problem so far, but it'd started bugging me now.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてか、なんて問わない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even ask myself why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even ask myself why.

MESSAGE.JP: 分、そういうものだからそうなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps that was just how it was meant to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps that was just how it was meant to be.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「今日はどうするんだ？」
理樹@「どうしようね…」
変わらず考えてない僕たち。
MESSAGE.EN: Like always, we hadn't given it any thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like always, we hadn't given it any thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうだ」
理樹@「買いたい本があるんだけど、鈴、付き合ってくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a book I want to buy, will you go with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a book I want to buy, will you go with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「商店街へ行くのか？」
理樹@「うん。鈴も買うものがあったら付き合ったげるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. If there's something you need to buy, I'll help you too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. If there's something you need to buy, I'll help you too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うむぅー？」
は考え込んだ。
鈴@「…そういえば、モンペチの新味が出ているかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Now that I think of it, there might be a new flavor of Mon Petit out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Now that I think of it, there might be a new flavor of Mon Petit out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ペット屋さん？」
鈴@「大量に買うならそうだけど、新味は違うトコで買う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's where I go when I need to buy something in large quantities, but I know a different place for new flavors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's where I go when I need to buy something in large quantities, but I know a different place for new flavors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひょっとして穴場みたいなところがあるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it some good place only a select few know of?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it some good place only a select few know of?❞

MESSAGE.JP: くこく、と頷く鈴。
理樹@「行き先と目的は決まったね。行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that we've figured out a destination and purpose, shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that we've figured out a destination and purpose, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: And so we hit the road.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so we hit the road.

MESSAGE.JP: やかな通りを歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: We were walking along the crowded street.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were walking along the crowded street.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「時々思うんだけどさ」
鈴@「うん？」
理樹@「歩いてる人たちからみた僕たちって浮いてないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whether we stand out from the people around us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whether we stand out from the people around us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「浮く？　何が浮くんだ？」
理樹@「…ほら、制服姿だし」
理樹@「浮いてないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if we stick out too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if we stick out too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうだろ…」
鈴@「んー」
は立ち止まって、ビルのショーウィンドウを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped in front of a shop window.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped in front of a shop window.

MESSAGE.JP: かぴかに磨かれた窓ガラスには僕たちが映っている。
MESSAGE.EN: We were reflected in the sparkling clean window.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were reflected in the sparkling clean window.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「別に変わったところはない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't really see anything strange about us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't really see anything strange about us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だよね」
当はあるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: But maybe there was one thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: But maybe there was one thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 段は恭介たちと一緒だったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Normally, we would be together with Kyousuke and everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: Normally, we would be together with Kyousuke and everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: は背伸びをしている。
理樹@「どうしたの、鈴？」
鈴@「中の棚のせいで見づらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't see well because of the shelf inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't see well because of the shelf inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうかな…僕は見えるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... I can see just fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... I can see just fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んーっ！」
りん、ちりん。
MESSAGE.EN: Her bell chimed as she was reaching up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her bell chimed as she was reaching up.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、ずれろ」
理樹@「え、なに僕のせい？　いいけど、はい」
に場所を譲った。
MESSAGE.EN: I let her take my place.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let her take my place.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー…」
理樹@「見えたから満足した？」
鈴@「理樹、戻れ」
理樹@「え、やっぱ僕なんかした？　いいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? So I did something wrong after all? Not that I mind of course...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? So I did something wrong after all? Not that I mind of course...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の場所に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to where I was standing before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to where I was standing before.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んーっ！」
た背伸びをする鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She was standing on tiptoe once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing on tiptoe once again.

MESSAGE.JP: りん。
鈴@「みづらい…」
理樹@「あ、そっか…」
は二人並んだ姿を確認したいのか。
MESSAGE.EN: She wanted to see us standing next to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wanted to see us standing next to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、ずれろ」
理樹@「えぇー」
ばらくずれたり戻ったりした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going back and forth for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going back and forth for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…満足した、鈴？」
終的にはショーウィンドウを三つぐらいはしごした。
MESSAGE.EN: We ended up eventually trying three different shop windows.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ended up eventually trying three different shop windows.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そもそも何をしにきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What did we even come here for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What did we even come here for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「忘れちゃったんだ、鈴…ええと買い物しにきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you already forgotten, Rin... We're here to shop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you already forgotten, Rin... We're here to shop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、じゃなくって」
鈴@「覚えてるぞ。もちろん覚えているとも。覚えていられたとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I didn't. Of course I remembered. I think I remembered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I didn't. Of course I remembered. I think I remembered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えば言うほど忘れていたくさい…。
MESSAGE.EN: The more she said the more it seemed like she completely forgot about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: The more she said the more it seemed like she completely forgot about it...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そっか。とりあえず先に本屋いっていいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, okay. How about we go to the bookstore first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, okay. How about we go to the bookstore first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん」
屋へ向かう。
理樹@「鈴、レジ行くよー…」
誌の棚のところで鈴は釘付けになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was enticed by the magazine stands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was enticed by the magazine stands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何見てるの？」
４変形判の薄い雑誌。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a thin A4-sized magazine.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a thin A4-sized magazine.

MESSAGE.JP: のタイトルを読む。
『毎日猫曜日』
紙には真っ黒い猫があくびをした写真が大きく載っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a large picture of a black cat yawning plastered on the cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a large picture of a black cat yawning plastered on the cover.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「きれいな犬歯だ」
にも犬歯があるんだよね、そういえば。
MESSAGE.EN: Do cats even have canine teeth...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do cats even have canine teeth...?

MESSAGE.JP: んで犬歯なんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why are they called canine teeth then...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why are they called canine teeth then...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほんとだ。真っ白で噛まれると痛そう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're right. They're really white, but it looks like it'd hurt a lot if you were bitten by them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're right. They're really white, but it looks like it'd hurt a lot if you were bitten by them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うみゅう」
げしげとその猫の写真に見入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was inspecting the picture of the cat intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was inspecting the picture of the cat intently.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「負けたなレノン」
の中で何かの勝負が決したらしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, a battle was fought and brought to conclusion inside her head...
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, a battle was fought and brought to conclusion inside her head...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「勝者の名前を覚えておこう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I shall remember the name of the victor...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I shall remember the name of the victor...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「けー・あーる・おー・ぶい…」
鈴@「…黒部（くろべ）？」
鈴@「日本猫か？」
理樹@「それはクロフ、って読むんだよ、鈴」
鈴@「くろふ？」
理樹@「クロフォードとかの愛称じゃないかなぁ」
鈴@「クロフ？」
理樹@「そうそう。真っ黒いからクロフ。じゃないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right. It's black, so Crawford. Or maybe not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right. It's black, so Crawford. Or maybe not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーみゅ…」
は雑誌を横にしたり縦にしたりしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was turning the magazine in her hands to look at the picture from different angles.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was turning the magazine in her hands to look at the picture from different angles.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいな、クロフ。うちにもこないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kurofu is great. I wonder if he would come to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kurofu is great. I wonder if he would come to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひょっとしたらくるかもしれないね」
鈴@「だといいな」
は名残惜しそうに雑誌を棚に戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the magazine back on the shelf with great reluctance.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the magazine back on the shelf with great reluctance.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「買わないの？」
鈴@「モンペチ買わないといけない」
理樹@「あ、そうか…」
はちょっと考えて、棚から雑誌を取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought for a while and took the magazine from the shelf.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought for a while and took the magazine from the shelf.

MESSAGE.JP: してそのままレジへ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: And took it to the cashier.
MESSAGE.Translation: And took it to the cashier.

MESSAGE.JP: っこん。
動ドアから出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The automatic doors quietly closed behind us as we left the store.
MESSAGE.Translation: The automatic doors quietly closed behind us as we left the store.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい、鈴」
さがさ、と紙袋からさっきの雑誌を渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: I produced the magazine from the bag and handed it to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I produced the magazine from the bag and handed it to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいのか？」
理樹@「そんなに高くなかったしね」
理樹@「クロフがくるといいね、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I hope Kurofu will come to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hope Kurofu will come to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うんっ」
誌を両手でぎゅー、と抱え込む鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She hugged the magazine to her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hugged the magazine to her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くるといいなっ」
機嫌な鈴を見て嬉しくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was delighted to see her in high spirits.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was delighted to see her in high spirits.

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴の笑顔を手に入れたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had brought a smile to her face with my very own hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had brought a smile to her face with my very own hands.

MESSAGE.JP: のものでもない、僕だけのものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't a smile for anyone else; it was for me alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't a smile for anyone else; it was for me alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「次はー、モンペチだね。鈴、案内してくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mon Petit is the only thing left. Will you show me the way, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mon Petit is the only thing left. Will you show me the way, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わかった」
りを鈴の指示に従って歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: We went along the road following Rin's lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went along the road following Rin's lead.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ここ」
理樹@「ここ、ってコンビニみたいだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... this looks like just a convenience store...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... this looks like just a convenience store...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れも大手のチェーンストアじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't look like it belonged to any major chain, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't look like it belonged to any major chain, either.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋さんか何かが業務転換したお店みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rather, it looked like a remodeled former liquor store.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rather, it looked like a remodeled former liquor store.

MESSAGE.JP: は緊張した面持ちだった。
ーっ！
くぅ。鈴が体をすくませる。
店員@「あら、猫子さん。いらっしゃい」
てきたのは年配の女性だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an old woman who came out to greet us.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an old woman who came out to greet us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…こ、こんにちは」
こ、と鈴は頭を下げた。
店員@「おじいさん、猫子さんがきたけど、あれ、どこだったかしらー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝Honey, the cat girl is here. Oh, where did I put it, I wonder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝Honey, the cat girl is here. Oh, where did I put it, I wonder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子って…鈴、自分の名前教えていないのかな…。まあそれはそれで親しげでいいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat girl, huh... Let me guess, she hadn't told them her name...? Well, they seemed to be on good terms regardless...
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat girl, huh... Let me guess, she hadn't told them her name...? Well, they seemed to be on good terms regardless...

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「えぇー？　レジのうしろー？　そんなのあったかしらねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝Hmm? Behind the counter? Could it have been here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝Hmm? Behind the counter? Could it have been here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: アから覗く店内の様子は、見知ったコンビニというよりはやっぱり酒屋さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a glance inside the shop, and as I suspected, it resembled a liquor shop much more than a convenience store.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a glance inside the shop, and as I suspected, it resembled a liquor shop much more than a convenience store.

MESSAGE.JP: 升瓶やら古ぼけたお菓子やらが並んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: There were lines of sake bottles and old-looking snacks on the shelves.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were lines of sake bottles and old-looking snacks on the shelves.

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「いつも手際悪くてごめんなさいねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝I'm sorry, it's always the same thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝I'm sorry, it's always the same thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを言いながら、店員さんは鈴に缶詰をいくつか見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: While speaking, the lady lined up a bunch of cans before Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: While speaking, the lady lined up a bunch of cans before Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「これとこれみたいだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝This and that are all I seem to have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝This and that are all I seem to have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…そっちのが欲しい」
店員@「こっち？　はいはい。みどりのほうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝This one? Just a moment. You mean this green one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝This one? Just a moment. You mean this green one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: から千円札を受け取った店員のおばあさんは、レジ袋に入れて戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a one thousand yen note from Rin, and came back after putting it in the cash register.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a one thousand yen note from Rin, and came back after putting it in the cash register.

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「いつもいつもありがとう」
釣りを受け取る鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin received the change from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin received the change from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「あ、スルメも入ってるから、良かったら食べてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝Oh, I put a dried squid inside so please help yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝Oh, I put a dried squid inside so please help yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はもう一度頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin bowed her head one more time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin bowed her head one more time.

MESSAGE.JP: も頭を下げる。
き出した鈴から袋を受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: Once we got outside, I took the bag from Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once we got outside, I took the bag from Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: から缶詰を取りだしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the can out from the bag and examined it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the can out from the bag and examined it.

MESSAGE.JP: モンペチ・シャークフレーク』。
味なのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd like to know what kind of flavor that is...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd like to know what kind of flavor that is...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？」
詰の脇に『試供品』と書いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed a ❛Sample❜ label on the side of the can.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed a ❛Sample❜ label on the side of the can.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…あそこのひとの息子さんが猫会社の社員さんらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Her son apparently works for a cat food manufacturer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Her son apparently works for a cat food manufacturer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 明かしをしてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She revealed the secret to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She revealed the secret to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。キャットフード作ってる会社の試供品」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. It's a sample from the cat food manufacturer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. It's a sample from the cat food manufacturer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から常に新味が確認できる、というわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That explains how she's always able to get the new flavors.
MESSAGE.Translation: That explains how she's always able to get the new flavors.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「感想とか書くともっといいらしいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It seems that I'm supposed to submit them my impressions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It seems that I'm supposed to submit them my impressions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…買うばかりであんまり役に立ってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...But I never do, I only buy, so I'm not very helpful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...But I never do, I only buy, so I'm not very helpful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、役に立ってると思うよ」
理樹@「鈴の反応から色々情報を得てるのかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They might figure out a lot of things from your reactions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They might figure out a lot of things from your reactions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうなのか？」
理樹@「多分ね」
鈴@「なら、いいんだが」
理樹@「鈴、雑誌眺めるのは寮の部屋に帰ってからにしなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you can read the magazine when we get back to the dorms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you can read the magazine when we get back to the dorms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー…」
々表紙に見入ってしまう鈴を注意しつつ、学校への帰路についた。
MESSAGE.EN: I warned her since she had trouble keeping her eyes off the cover as we were walking back to school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I warned her since she had trouble keeping her eyes off the cover as we were walking back to school.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み。
かぽか陽気は眠気を誘う。
MESSAGE.EN: The weather was so warm it was making me drowsy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The weather was so warm it was making me drowsy.

MESSAGE.JP: 習でぽっかり空いた時間、鈴を誘ってひなたぼっこすることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: We had some time dedicated to self-study, so I asked Rin to join me in the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had some time dedicated to self-study, so I asked Rin to join me in the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おいで」
鈴@「こら、おまえら、さっきから呼んでるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, are you even listening to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, are you even listening to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おいでー」
まりに日溜まりが心地よいのか、猫たちはけだるげだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The warm sunshine felt so good the cats were all lethargic.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warm sunshine felt so good the cats were all lethargic.

MESSAGE.JP: ろごろするだけで鈴の呼びかけに応えない。
MESSAGE.EN: They'd just roll around, paying no heed to her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: They'd just roll around, paying no heed to her words.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あはは。鈴、今日は袖にされてるねぇ」
鈴@「うぅーっ」
満そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin showed a look of discontent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin showed a look of discontent.

MESSAGE.JP: さく口をとがらせている。
鈴@「もういい」
鈴@「あたしも寝るっ」
ろん。
ろごろ。
鈴@「にゃー」
みゃふみゃ！
ている猫たちにごろごろ転がってちょっかいを出しては逃げられている。
MESSAGE.EN: Making a purring sound, she rolled up to the sleeping cats, only to have them run away from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making a purring sound, she rolled up to the sleeping cats, only to have them run away from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふかーっ！」
理樹@「鈴のほうが威嚇してるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, they sense a threat from you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, they sense a threat from you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I said with a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said with a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、猫たち、ごろごろさせてあげようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let them lie around if they want to, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let them lie around if they want to, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんでだっ。遊びたい」
理樹@「代わりに僕が遊んであげるからさ」
ろごろごろ。
が戻ってきた。
鈴@「にゃー」
理樹@「はいはい。しょうがないな、鈴は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, okay. I'm gonna play with you, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, okay. I'm gonna play with you, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「猫じゃらしでも遊ぶ？」
鈴@「あれは操るのがいいんだぞ。操られるのは好きくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I like it when I use it, not when someone dangles it in front of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I like it when I use it, not when someone dangles it in front of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも意外と面白いかもしれないよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But what if it's actually pretty fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But what if it's actually pretty fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら」
の前で揺らしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved it in front of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved it in front of her.

MESSAGE.JP: したしっ、と手を伸ばしてくる。
瞬で食いついてきた。
鈴@「うぅ…なかなか強敵だな…こんな奴と戦ってたのかあいつらは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh... That's a tough opponent... Were they fighting someone so strong all this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh... That's a tough opponent... Were they fighting someone so strong all this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さふさっ。
し、たしっ。
さっ。
し、たしっ。
さふさっ。
し、たしっ。
鈴@「ふかあぁぁぁーーっっ！」
に飛びかかってきた。大きすぎるのでこちらは確実に捕まる。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaped at me. She was big enough that I was literally caught entirely by her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaped at me. She was big enough that I was literally caught entirely by her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふらすとれーしょん溜めすぎだっ」
鈴@「適度に捕まえさせろ、こらーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're supposed to let me catch it every now and then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're supposed to let me catch it every now and then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おっと、そうだったね…」
ろごろごろ。
嫌が悪くなったのか、転がっていっちゃった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her mood crashed down and she rolled away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her mood crashed down and she rolled away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 陰からそんな恨みがましい目を…。
MESSAGE.EN: A pair of eyes full of bitterness were gleaming from the shadow of the tree...
MESSAGE.Translation: A pair of eyes full of bitterness were gleaming from the shadow of the tree...

MESSAGE.JP: 当に猫のような鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She really was just like a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really was just like a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことをして昼休み中ずっと鈴と遊んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I spent all of the lunch break playing with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spent all of the lunch break playing with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒが終わる。
りん、と鈴の音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the bell resounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the bell resounded.

MESSAGE.JP: を持ち上げたのと、鈴がそばにきたのは同時だった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I picked up my school bag, Rin was already standing by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I picked up my school bag, Rin was already standing by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いこっか、鈴」
がしい教室をそっと抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: We quietly left the bustling classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We quietly left the bustling classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: は本当に音を立てず猫みたいに歩くことができる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was able to walk without making any sound whatsoever, just like a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was able to walk without making any sound whatsoever, just like a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: れの見よう見まねをしている僕。
MESSAGE.EN: I was trying to learn that trick by watching her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was trying to learn that trick by watching her.

MESSAGE.JP: 下に出ると、なぜだかおかしくてくすくす笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: It started to feel really funny once we were in the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: It started to feel really funny once we were in the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「さっきから何がおかしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's been so funny since a while ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's been so funny since a while ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、ごめん…」
理樹@「いつのまにか揃って教室すぐ抜け出すのが上手くなったな、って思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just thought that we've become so good at ducking out of the classroom together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just thought that we've become so good at ducking out of the classroom together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し前なら想像もつかないことしてるな、僕。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something hard to even imagine before.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something hard to even imagine before.

MESSAGE.JP: やかで、暖かいふわっとした湯水にくるまれているような気分。
MESSAGE.EN: I had this bittersweet, uplifting feeling, like I was feeling hot and chilly at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had this bittersweet, uplifting feeling, like I was feeling hot and chilly at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: れがとてもくすぐったい。
鈴@「でも理樹はまだ足音が立ってるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But you still make a sound when you step.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But you still make a sound when you step.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「着地のときつい出ちゃうんだよね、上靴がさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But my shoes just make it every time I step on the floor...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But my shoes just make it every time I step on the floor...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もっとこう底を床につけてだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You have to shift your weight like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You have to shift your weight like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の講義を受けながら廊下を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked along the corridor while listening to her explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked along the corridor while listening to her explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: の時、来た。
MESSAGE.EN: And at that instant, it came.
MESSAGE.Translation: And at that instant, it came.

MESSAGE.JP: つものだ。
鈴@「理樹っ」
も今はいいんだ。鈴というパートナーがいる。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was okay this time. I had a partner named Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was okay this time. I had a partner named Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 外頼もしいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a lot more reliable than I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a lot more reliable than I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: して僕の彼女でもある。
から、この病も受け入れたっていいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I could even accept my condition.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I could even accept my condition.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹っ」
と現実の狭間で声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: As I crossed the border between the reality and dream, I heard a voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I crossed the border between the reality and dream, I heard a voice.

MESSAGE.JP: ちていく…。
落ちていく…。
こまでも続く闇を…。
を伸ばしても、それは何にも引っかからず…
MESSAGE.EN: I reached out my hand, but there was nothing...
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached out my hand, but there was nothing...

MESSAGE.JP: は最後に恐怖を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: At the end there was fear.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the end there was fear.
